snippet: Los Angeles, San Francisco, Boston and Washington are under consideration as sites for the 2024 Summer Games; the United States committee expects to decide in January.
abstract: United States Olympic Committee is expected to decide in January 2015 which city will be official US nominee for 2024 Summer Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles, San Francisco, Boston and Washington are under consideration as sites for the 2024 Summer Games; the United States committee expects to decide in January.

headline.main: United States to Bid for 2024 Games
headline.print_headline: United States to Bid for 2024 Games
